name: LAADS DAAC
description: NASA's Level-1 and Atmosphere Archive and Distribution System Distributed Active Archive Center (LAADS DAAC) primarily provides access to global science data products from the MODIS instrument aboard the Terra and Aqua platforms, and the VIIRS instrument aboard the Suomi NPP and JPSS platforms. It archives and distributes MODIS products: Level 1 products (calibrated radiances and geolocation) and Level 2 and 3 atmosphere and land products.
